performance_optimization_default.preamble: Identify and optimize performance bottlenecks. Implement caching strategies, optimize algorithms, and improve resource utilization. Target specific performance metrics with measurable improvements.

resource_optimization_default.preamble: Optimize resource usage including memory, CPU, and storage. Implement efficient resource allocation, cleanup procedures, and monitoring. Provide before/after metrics.

workflow_optimization_default.preamble: Analyze and optimize workflows for efficiency. Identify bottlenecks, automate repetitive tasks, and streamline processes. Provide implementation plan with ROI estimates.

seo_optimization_default.preamble: Optimize content and technical SEO factors. Improve page speed, meta tags, structured data, and content quality. Generate SEO audit report with actionable recommendations.

cost_optimization_default.preamble: Analyze and optimize costs across infrastructure, services, and operations. Identify savings opportunities, implement cost controls, and provide ROI analysis.
